Package dev.mxace.pronounmc.api

Interface PronounsEventListener

public interface PronounsEventListener
Event listener that listens to PronounMC events.

2.2
Author:

    • onPronounsSetApprovementStatusChanged

      void onPronounsSetApprovementStatusChanged(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, PronounsSet pronounsSet, PronounsSetApprovementStatus oldApprovementStatus, PronounsSetApprovementStatus newApprovementStatus)

      Parameters:
      player - The player whose pronouns set approvement status changed.
      pronounsSet - The pronouns set of which teh approvement status changed.
      oldApprovementStatus - The old approvement status.
      newApprovementStatus - The new approvement status.
